verses.verse: Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song, <S%H7892><s%> for he has done <S%H6213><s%> marvelous things! <S%H6381><s%> His right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and his holy <S%H6944><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> have worked salvation for him. <S%H3467><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has made known <S%H3045><s%> his salvation. <S%H3444><s%> He has openly shown <S%H1540><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

He has remembered <S%H2142><s%> his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and his faithfulness <S%H530><s%> toward the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> All the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all the earth! <S%H776><s%> Burst out and sing <S%H6476><s%> for joy, <S%H7442><s%> yes, <S%H2167><s%> sing praises!
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with the harp, <S%H3658><s%> with the harp <S%H3658><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of melody. <S%H2172><s%>
With trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and sound <S%H6963><s%> of the ram <S%H7782><s%>'s horn, make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%> with its fullness; <S%H4393><s%> the world, <S%H8398><s%> and those who dwell therein. <S%H3427><s%>
Let the rivers <S%H5104><s%> clap <S%H4222><s%> their hands. <S%H3709><s%> Let the mountains <S%H2022><s%> sing for joy <S%H7442><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

Let them sing before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he comes <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%> He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> with righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity. <S%H4339><s%>
